complianceText:
The chatbot output does not comply with the description in several ways: 1. There are multiple issues with the tags that have been implemented incorrectly or are malformed, such as "yki" and "" which are invalid HTML tags. 2. The overall structure shows several sequences of meaningless or invalid HTML tags which do not properly wrap key words and phrases as instructed. tags containing proper sentences. 3. The output should have three complete

tags with correctly nested and properly formatted HTML tags. The output doesn't meet this requirement clearly, as it has malformed tags and only one coherent sentence distributed across these tags. Considering these explainable formatting issues and misuses, the output doesn't comply with the description requiring each sentence to be encompassed in properly formatted
